title: Mystery Surrounds Alligator Found In Suburban New York Waterway

summary: An alligator was found in a creek in Rockland County, New York, sparking widespread confusion and curiosity about how it ended up there.

title: 'Terrible' AI Has Given Tech An Existential Headache: Activist
content: "Then the moment they got an opportunity, with AI, to increase shareholder returns... every single one of them slammed the red button," climate activist Sage Lenier said.

title: "This Is Anubis": Apollo The Dog Is Viral After Climbing Giza Pyramid
content: The viral footage, captured by American paragliding enthusiast Alex Lang and shared online by his friend Marshall Mosher, showed Apollo - the dog - fearlessly climbing the 136-metre monument.

title: Airbus A321XLR: The Fuel-Efficient, Single-Aisle, Long-Range Aircraft
content: The A321XLR, standing for "Xtra Long Range," is the longest-range commercial aircraft in its class, capable of flying up to 8,700 km.

title: G20 Leaders To Discuss Climate, Tax, Donald Trump's Comeback In Brazil
content: G20 leaders gather in Brazil on Monday to discuss fighting poverty, boosting climate financing and other multilateral initiatives that could yet be upended by Donald Trump's impending return to the White House.

title: Opinion: How PM Modi Transformed India-Africa Engagement
content: Indias relationship with African nations has deep roots, but despite decades of diplomatic rhetoric, these ties often remained lukewarm. To Modis credit, he has revitalised India-Africa relations, making them a priority.
summary: Indias relationship with African nations has deep roots, but despite decades of diplomatic rhetoric, these ties often remained lukewarm. To Modis credit, he has revitalised India-Africa relations, making them a priority.

title: Swedish Minister Bans Bananas On Official Visits, Seeks Help For Phobia
content: Bananaphobia is a rare and intense fear of bananas that can lead to significant discomfort when exposed to the fruit.
summary: Bananaphobia is a rare and intense fear of bananas that can lead to significant discomfort when exposed to the fruit.

title: What Studies On Soil Sample From Moon's Far Side Have Found
content: Volcanic rock in the sample collected by Chang'e-6, the first mission that brought back soil from the far side of the Moon, is about 2.8 billion years old, suggesting the landing site was volcanically active at the time, according to two new studies.
summary: Volcanic rock in the sample collected by Chang'e-6, the first mission that brought back soil from the far side of the Moon, is about 2.8 billion years old, suggesting the landing site was volcanically active at the time, according to two new studies.

title: Australian Radio Host, Alan Jones, Arrested Over Alleged Sex Offences
